title: [K-12] Metacognitive Awareness Measurement and Enhancement Strategies in Medical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of medical physiology and understanding of learning theories
context.additional_context: Environment enabling data collection via digital devices (tablets/laptops), teacher-led discussion sessions

learning_goals: Learners can accurately assess their cognitive levels using post-decision wagering and Likert scales
Learners can understand differences in metacognitive measurement tools and analyze the gap between actual knowledge and perceived understanding
Learners can present three or more self-monitoring strategies to reduce metacognitive errors
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
